meanings.definition: The quality or state of being memorable.
meanings.sent1: The memorableness of the event made it unforgettable.
meanings.sent2: The memorableness of the movie made it a classic.
meanings.sent3: The memorableness of the joke had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: The memorableness of her smile lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The memorableness of the sunset painted a lasting image in my mind.

meanings.definition: The ability to be easily remembered or recalled.
meanings.sent1: The memorableness of the melody stayed with me all day.
meanings.sent2: The memorableness of her name made it easy to recall.
meanings.sent3: The memorableness of the recipe made it a family favorite.
meanings.sent4: The memorableness of his words echoed in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The memorableness of the quote stuck with me for years.
